thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: nadia scott
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by nadia scott

author: nadia scott
title: nadia scott
text: I have never used a vacation planner before. But I decided that I would give Costa Rica and vacations a try because I was just too busy and overwhelmed to plan the perfect vacation. I am so glad I did!!! Everything was perfect. They planned several tours for me and we were picked up on time each and every time . can't believe what a difference it was to not have to worry or stress about booking great tours and on how to get to the tours . This made our vacation stress-free and even more awesome !!!! Thank you Costa Rica and vacations for exceeding our expectations. We loved working with you !
